about_the_game:
Dominate the fight in this new dojo, perfect to take your kung fu skills to the next level.

And of course, what's a kung fu game without great music? This DLC features an electrifying new soundtrack that will keep you pumped up and ready to fight.
detailed_description:
Dominate the fight in this new dojo, perfect to take your kung fu skills to the next level.

And of course, what's a kung fu game without great music? This DLC features an electrifying new soundtrack that will keep you pumped up and ready to fight.
name: Crazy Kung Fu - Mountain Dojo

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Crazy Kung Fu - Mountain Dojo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD FX 8350
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Standing Only
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 Skylake or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Dominate the fight in this new dojo, perfect to take your kung fu skills to the next level. And of course, what's a kung fu game without great music? This DLC features an electrifying new soundtrack that will keep you pumped up and ready to fight.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish
